name: Lonebots
description:
My entry for the FloppyJAM '18

The idea was to create a game with the aesthetics of classical 90s 3D games like Doom or DukeNukem, but I spend most of the time creating the editor instead of the game.

There is no gameplay yet, the concept of the game is to control some robots through a series of corridors while avoiding the enemy robots, but right now robots do not interact with each other.

I spend too much time creating the level editor (which right now is very powerful).

I will add new features soon.

Intro
Map View Pressin Z you can zoom to the robot view
Pressing N you can toggle the alert mode Map Editor (press Control S to save any changes)
